CatDescriptText: Martha Tadom, 1609 Monterey Street, North Side was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1957, pg. 8 with question: "Do you think the city wage tax, which is one-half of one percent of your wage, is fair or unfair?" Answer reads: "Sometime I think that it's fair and other times it impresses me as being unfair.  Generally, I would consider it unfair because there are so many other taxes."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Martha Tadom wearing dark dress with belt and light colored cardigan with beading, posed in front of shoe store window
